original: 對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>勢力進行<color=#c0f5ff>親善</color>，與我方增加友好度<color=#bceea7>$num1點</color>，降低了對方來攻的機會！
text: <color=#c0f5ff>「Goodwill」</color> to the forces of <color=#fff999>$country1</color>, increase friendship with us <color=#bceea7>$num1 point</color>, reduce The opportunity for the opponent to attack!
